page.title: 04Family Life in Holbury
page.content: Dads up at 4.30am because he works at a firm called Millbrook Furnishing. He drives a lorry travelling around Britain.Mum gets up at 7.00am.She goes downstairs and makes a cup of tea then calls up at 7.30am to get my brother and I up.We come for breakfast,mum finishes in the bathroom we get ready. About 8.35am we are on our way mum sits down then watches Country Practice her favourite programme.We go to Holbury Middle School.At 3.30pm a bell goes and we go home then mum calls teatime.Then we all help with the washing and drying up.I go to bed at 8.30pm.Sundays are usually different everyones in bed till about 9.00am.Everyones downstairs and having breakfast.Mum does the dinner,my brother goes to play,at 11.45am we go to ESSO club till 1.45pm then we have our Sunday roast.
